attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Keith Le'cornue is currently considering departing Bristol and doing whatever he does, elsewhere. I for one believe that he should do whatever he actually does in Bristol. Anyone else in? We'd all miss seeing him out everynow and again with an outlandish gurn, him making stupid bets, his glorying supporting of man U and his silly ideas. LETS KEEP KIETH THE BEEF (or CHEIF).

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
